values.value: When one of the source attributes is being updated, the new data value is checked against the following rule: LaunchDate < RelaunchDate < ExitDate If the chronological order is not maintained, the update will be rejected.

iif[GetAttributeValue["global launch date"]<GetAttributeValue["local launch date"] AND GetAttributeValue["local launch date"] < GetAttributeValue["local exit date"] AND GetAttributeValue["global launch date"] < GetAttributeValue["local exit date"], true, AddAttributeError[]]
